home.title:
Refreak is a purpose-built tool to
improve your FACEIT experience
home.description:
Meet the extension that will help you win more.
Grenade lineups, smurf detection, and interface customization.

grenadeLineups.title: Grenade lineups
grenadeLineups.description: Learn Counter-Strike 2 grenade lineups directly on FACEIT.

blockAds.title: Block ads
blockAds.description:
Instantly block annoying ads,
pop-ups & intrusive trackers.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-language support
multiLanguage.description: We currently support English and Russian, and we will soon add more languages.

home.footer: Refreak is developed independently, and is not officially endorsed by or affiliated with FACEIT.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Analysis, guides, and insights on Counter-Strike 2 and FACEIT gameplay.
